def_cn: 重复;雷同;翻版;老调重弹
def_en: If you describe something as a rehash, you are criticizing it because it repeats old ideas, facts, or themes, though some things have been changed to make it appear new.

def_cn: 对…改头换面;只作轻微改动地重复
def_en: If you say that someone rehashes old ideas, facts, or accusations, you disapprove of the fact that they present them in a slightly different way so that they seem new or original.
